rows.label: tlk45420144_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The Hr√¶svelgr Mercenaries seem to be
growing at a steady rate.

rows.label: tlk45420144_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Do you think we might actually
end up bigger than we were when
Vandham was around?

rows.label: tlk45420144_04_msg0003
rows.name:
The guy had a big heart and an even
bigger body, but he wasn't exactly big
on sweating the small stuff.

rows.label: tlk45420144_04_msg0004
rows.name:
To make the band any bigger than
it is now will take someone with an
eye for details and efficiency.

rows.label: tlk45420144_04_msg0005
rows.name:
The main thing is to look at the skills
required for each mission and choose
appropriate Blades for the job.

rows.label: tlk45420144_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Do that, and you can clear up missions
that would usually take a whole day
in the space of a single morning!
